analysis.description:
CslTokenDistribution.balances (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#42-43) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- balanceOf (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#112-116)

CslTokenDistribution.airdrop (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#128-137) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-cslToken.transfer(addresses[i],drop) (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#135-137)

CslTokenDistribution.distribution (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#139-149) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-cslToken.transfer(addresses[i],amount) (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#146-148)

CslTokenDistribution.distributeAmounts (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#149-163) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-cslToken.transfer(addresses[i],amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#162)

CslTokenDistribution.getTokens (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#165-183) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-cslToken.transfer(investor,tokens) (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#182)

CslTokenDistribution.airdrop has external calls inside a loop:
	- cslToken.transfer(addresses[i],drop) (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#135-137)

CslTokenDistribution.distribution has external calls inside a loop:
	- cslToken.transfer(addresses[i],amount) (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#146-148)

CslTokenDistribution.distributeAmounts has external calls inside a loop:
	- cslToken.transfer(addresses[i],amounts[i]) (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#162)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.19 (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_tokenAddress' of CslTokenDistribution.CslTokenDistribution (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#58) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_owner' of CslTokenDistribution.CslTokenDistribution (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#58-59) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_Drop' of CslTokenDistribution.setAirdrop (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#72) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_value' of CslTokenDistribution.setCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#73-74) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_bonus' of CslTokenDistribution.setCrowdsale (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#74-75) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_holder' of CslTokenDistribution.balanceOf (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#115) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_addr' of CslTokenDistribution.getEthBalance (/unique_chucks/16/0x4c79c1c19cfac6c05e5850226ad41fc2ddf85491.sol#124) is not in mixedCase
